00025 #ifndef _BASE_VFILE_
00026 #define _BASE_VFILE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/VEntry>
00030 #include <base/path_not_found>
00031 #include <base/io_error>
00032 
00033 #include <iostream>
00034 #include <fstream>
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace base {
00038 
00039 
00040 class VFile : public VEntry
00041 {
00042 public:
00043   virtual ~VFile() {}
00044 
00045   virtual bool isDirectory() const { return false; }
00046 
00047   virtual String extension() const = 0;  ///< the file's extension (e.g. 'png')
00048 
00049   virtual std::istream&  istream() const throw(io_error) = 0;
00050   virtual std::ostream&  ostream() const throw(io_error) = 0;
00051   virtual std::iostream& iostream(std::iostream::openmode mode = (std::iostream::in | std::iostream::out) ) const throw(io_error) = 0;
00052 
00053   virtual void close() const throw(io_error) = 0; ///< close the file (can be re-opened again via istream/ostream/iostream() )
00054 
00055 protected:
00056   VFile(const PathName& pathname) : VEntry(pathname) {}
00057   VFile(const VFile& f) : VEntry(f) {}
00058 
00059   friend class VFileSystem;
00060 };
00061 
00062 } // base
00063 
00064 #endif
